definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
grand justice/high court justice/supreme court justice

sentences.english: The justice ' clerk assert that the justice is functi officio.
sentences.chinese: 法官的祕書宣稱法官已不再有管轄權。

sentences.english: The justice ' clerk assert that the justice is functi officio.
sentences.chinese: 法官的祕書宣稱法官已不再有管轄權。

sentences.english: Judge Orie had the curtains drawn while Mladic was taken out of court.
sentences.chinese: 當姆拉迪奇被帶出法庭時，法官奧列將簾子拉下。

sentences.english: Probably the most noticeable thing we would see is the big, important seat of the judge.
sentences.chinese: 最顯眼的可能就是法官所坐的大靠背椅。

sentences.english: The judge played bridge in the lodge with the budgeter last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚法官和預算員在門房裏打過橋牌。

sentences.english: My father was the presiding judge in a case involving a man charged with tax evasion.
sentences.chinese: 我父親是一宗一男子逃稅案的主法官。

sentences.english: The judge stayed the sentence until the following day.
sentences.chinese: 法官把判決拖德溱二天才宣讀。

sentences.english: Judge-made law is called common law.
sentences.chinese: 法官造法就被稱爲普通法。

sentences.english: The judge told the prisoner the jury had acquitted him of the charge of bigamy.
sentences.chinese: 法官告訴犯人陪審團撤消對他重婚罪的指控。

sentences.english: The judge enjoined him from selling alcohol.
They refused to provide the judge with a scale of values not contained in the positive law.
sentences.chinese: 他們拒絕爲法官提供實在法所未規定的任何價值標準。

sentences.english: The judge placed his hands on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 法官把兩手放在地上，看着對方。

sentences.english: The judge said that nothing could mitigate the cruelty with which the mother had treated her child.
sentences.chinese: 法官說，這位母親虐待孩子，罪行無法減輕。

sentences.english: Want to be an assistant judge or notary.
sentences.chinese: 想成爲一名助理法官或公證人。

sentences.english: Judge Stephens allowed no foolishness when he held court.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂芬斯法官開庭時不允許人胡來。

sentences.english: The judge found him guilty of unpardonable evil.
sentences.chinese: 法官認定他的罪行十惡不赦。

definition: public prosecutor/public procurator (judicial officer whose job may involve both criminal investigation and public prosecution)
criminal court/abbr. for 刑事法庭[xing2 shi4 fa3 ting2]
grand justice/high court justice/supreme court justice
